channel.title: [VB6] Eliteclient 1.13 Source Code
channel.description:
Yep, I have decided to release it as it has been about 4 months since I have touched it. :P It is not too badly outdated, because I updated several things for you. Things that need to be fixed or updated:
Autologout World loading The separate stat lookup page
The world loading I have somewhat fixed. A few worlds need to be added and it should work great. (note: for worlds above 126 you might have to do some extra coding to fix) Autologout just needs a change of colors. The statlookup panel on the main page is working. Amazingly, the bank pin enterer has managed to work the whole time. :) URL: [url=http://eliteclient.cruels.net/EC1.13.zip]Eliteclient 1.13 VB6 Source[/url] NOTE: IF YOU USE ANY OF THIS, PLEASE GIVE ME CREDIT. :) Just a warning- The code isn't very organized and is very nubby in some places. ;) I will release a better bank pin enterer sometime as the coding in the one in here is shit. ;)

item.title: [VB6] Eliteclient 1.13 Source Code
item.dc:creator: @joewnn joewnn
item.description:
@joewnn wrote:

Yep, I have decided to release it as it has been about 4 months since I have touched it.

It is not too badly outdated, because I updated several things for you.
Things that need to be fixed or updated:

Autologout World loading The separate stat lookup page

The world loading I have somewhat fixed. A few worlds need to be added and it should work great. (note: for worlds above 126 you might have to do some extra coding to fix)

Autologout just needs a change of colors. The statlookup panel on the main page is working. Amazingly, the bank pin enterer has managed to work the whole time.

URL:

NOTE: IF YOU USE ANY OF THIS, PLEASE GIVE ME CREDIT.
